name: Namor

abilities.name: Trident Strike / Throw
abilities.details: Strikes with Trident of Neptune. Can be charged to throw.

abilities.name: Hydro Blast
abilities.details: Unleashes a powerful blast of water, pushing enemies back.

abilities.name: Ocean's Fury
abilities.details: Lunges forward with the trident, piercing enemies.

ultimate.name: Imperius Rex! (Tidal Wave)
ultimate.effect: Summons a massive tidal wave that crashes forward, dealing damage and displacing enemies.
ultimate.details: Asserts his royal authority over the sea.

passives.name: Atlantean Physiology
passives.details: Enhanced strength, durability. Regenerates health faster when near water sources (if any exist on maps).

lore: The Sub-Mariner, king of Atlantis. Namor McKenzie is a human-Atlantean hybrid mutant, possessing immense strength, flight, and command over the oceans. He is fiercely protective of his kingdom, often acting as an anti-hero.
